articleData.blog_content:
My journey with desire foundation started when I was in my 2nd year looking for being part of an organization. I was in a dilemma about which society to join in but then I heard about desire from my roommate.

I still remember the day when I walked in for the interview, I was so nervous, but finally, I was selected as a marketing intern. Its been one and a half years since I have been a part of this wonderful family. I got to learn so many things from my seniors be it in the academic field or marketing-related work. Desire not only gave me a platform to do something for society but it also helped me to groom myself as an individual. It helped me to learn on how to work as a team & as an individual.

It always feels so nice to see a smile on the parents' faces when they say that their child got admitted to a school. I always fall short of words to express this feeling. It feels so great to realize that it's going to be almost 2 years working with desire, whereas it just feels like yesterday.
